column2: BRIEF-American Homes 4 Rent Announced Cancellation Of Co's Presentation & Webcast At Citi 2020 Global Property CEO Conference Feb 28 (Reuters) - American Homes 4 Rent: * AMERICAN HOMES 4 RENT - ANNOUNCED TODAY CANCELLATION OF COâ€™S PRESENTATION & WEBCAST AT CITI 2020 GLOBAL PROPERTY CEO CONFERENCE * AMERICAN HOMES 4 RENT - MANAGEMENT NO LONGER PLANS TO ATTEND CONFERENCE DUE TO ABUNDANCE OF CAUTION RELATED TO TRAVEL AMIDST EVOLVING VIRUS LANDSCAPE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-American Homes 4 Rent Appoints Christopher Lau As Chief Financial Officer May 23 (Reuters) - American Homes 4 Rent: * LAU SUCCEEDS DIANA LAING, WHO RESIGNED AS CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER, EFFECTIVE JUNE 30, 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-American Homes 4 Rent Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share Of $0.02 May 3 (Reuters) - American Homes 4 Rent: * REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL AND OPERATING RESULTS * Q1 REVENUE $258 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $251.5 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.03 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SEES FULL YEAR 2018 CORE NOI AFTER CAPITAL EXPENDITURES GROWTH 3.0% - 4.0% Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
